channel.title: Central Pacific Tropical Weather Outlook
channel.description: Central Pacific Hurricane Center - Central Pacific Tropical Weather Outlook

item.title: Central Pacific Tropical Weather Outlook
item.description:
264
ACPN50 PHFO 071128
TWOCP

Tropical Weather Outlook
NWS Central Pacific Hurricane Center Honolulu HI
Issued by NWS National Hurricane Center Miami FL
200 AM HST Tue Oct 07 2025

For the central North Pacific...between 140W and 180W:

Active Systems:
The National Hurricane Center is issuing advisories on Tropical
Storm Octave, located well to the southwest of the southern tip of
the Baja California Peninsula, and on Hurricane Priscilla, located a
couple hundred miles offshore of west-central Mexico.

Tropical cyclone formation is not expected during the next 7 days.

$$
Forecaster Hagen
NNNN
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (nhcwebmaster)
